data.name: Kawaii Girls - Artbook 18+
data.detailed_description: In this DLC you will find 70 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder in the folder with the game. Enjoy
data.about_the_game: In this DLC you will find 70 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder in the folder with the game. Enjoy
data.short_description: In this DLC you will find 70 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder in the folder with the game. Enjoy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Nakedness.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.
